long_description: Made of moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric, the Sugoi Moxie shirt for women features a burnout print that's perfect for fitness with a fashionable twist. Quick-drying fabric provides breathability and moisture management. Scoop neck design offers comfortable coverage; raglan sleeves enhance freedom of motion. Closeout.
short_description: Made of moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric, the Sugoi Moxie shirt for women features a burnout print that's perfect for fitness with a fashionable twist.
